original_query: When the Office WLED is turned on, wait 2 seconds, then turn on all living room lights to 70%, wait another 3 seconds, and set the Office WLED to 100% brightness

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living, office, living_room
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

message: I found some ambiguities in your request. I detected these locations: office, living_room. Please answer 2 question(s) to help me create the automation accurately.
